definition: Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
surname Shao
to continue/to carry on
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
surname Xing
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
Shaoxing prefecture, Zhejiang

sentences.english: Shaoxing county is one of the major grain production areas in Zhengjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 紹興縣是浙江省糧食主要產區之一。

sentences.english: She played the role of lin daiyu in a shaoxing adaptation of dream of the red chamber.
sentences.chinese: 她在紹興摺子戲中扮演紅樓夢的林黛玉。

sentences.english: The water used in making yellow wine is from Jianhu, where water is quality.
sentences.chinese: 釀製紹興黃酒的水一向取於水質特好的鑑湖。

sentences.english: This year's New Year's eve, I was spent in shaoxing grandma's.
sentences.chinese: 今年的除夕，我是在紹興奶奶家度過的。

sentences.english: Cymbidium is the city flower of Shaoxing and also a famous flower in China.
sentences.chinese: 蘭花是紹興市花，是我國傳統名花。

sentences.english: Shaoxing Lotus Flower Fall has a long history. It was quite famous even in the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 紹興蓮花落起源甚早，宋時已頗流行。

sentences.english: The status of machinery tea production in Shaoxing city was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了紹興市茶葉生產機械化工作的成就和現狀。

sentences.english: We like Shao Xing rice wine because it tastes good.
sentences.chinese: 紹興酒屬米酒類，品之香味誘人，有點象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: As the government of the South Sung Dynasty stabilized, the bowmen were removed during the 4th year of Shaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 隨著南宋政權趨於穩定，紹興四年高宗罷廢新置弓手。

sentences.english: Shaoxing wine is a sort of rice wine, it is attractive by fragrant , like the Qing wine in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 紹興酒屬米酒類，品之香味誘人，有點象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Company general headquarters lie in da sheng country fu quan town shaoxing Zhejiang, the traffic is very convenient.
sentences.chinese: 公司總部位於紹興縣福全鎮大生，交通十分便利。

sentences.english: The next year, she became head of the Shaoxing Datong College.
sentences.chinese: 第二年，她成爲紹興大同學院的校長。

sentences.english: People also call Shaoxing wine "Aged Wine".
sentences.chinese: 人們又管紹興黃酒叫老酒。

sentences.english: Usually in a performance there are three performers working as a group.
sentences.chinese: 紹興蓮花落一般以三人一組演出。

sentences.english: Data sets obtained from Shaoxing and Fuyang in Zhejiang province are analyzed as an illustration of the proposed methods.
sentences.chinese: 作爲實例，文章分析了從浙江紹興和富陽得到的數據。

sentences.english: Shaoxing Xuan Cai Jin Textile Import and Export Corporation is a subsidiary of a foreign trade company.
sentences.chinese: 紹興絢彩進出口公司是金燦紡織下屬的一家外貿公司。

definition: Ningbo subprovincial city in Zhejiang

Guizhou province (Kweichow) in south central China, abbr. to 黔[Qian2] or 貴|贵[Gui4], capital Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]

short name for Shanghai
Shandong, province in northeast China, short name 魯|鲁[Lu3], capital Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2]
